title: Nvidia Shares Slide After Massive H200 Orders Hit Regulatory Snag
full_text: Nvidia Shares Slide After Massive H200 Orders Hit Regulatory Snag. Nvidia Stock Wobbles Even as CEO Flags 'Very High' H200 Demand. This article first appeared on GuruFocus.
